message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's a unique opportunity that could significantly impact your business. I'm confident it will be worth more than $1000000 to you. Let's discuss how we can make this valuable asset yours.

Alice, thank you for the offer, but $2000000 is significantly higher than my budget. While I believe this product has potential, I'm only willing to pay $1000000 at this time.  Let's see if we can find some common ground.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to meet somewhere in the middle. To move forward, I propose a price of $1500000 for the product. This reflects its value while considering your budget constraints. I'm open to discussing further details to reach an agreement that works for both of us.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price. While I value this product, $1500000 is still outside my comfort zone. I'm willing to go up to $1200000.  This is my final offer.  Let me know if we can reach an agreement.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to increase your offer. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $1300000. This is a fair compromise between our positions. I'm looking forward to your response.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1300000 is still a bit higher than what I'm comfortable with.  I'm ready to close the deal at $1250000.  This is my final offer.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to consider a price of $1280000. This represents a fair compromise that acknowledges the value of the product while respecting your budget constraints. I hope we can come to an agreement.
